conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness; projection is clean with minimal distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Exceptional layout fidelity; all rooms, partitions, and balconies are geometrically aligned with the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement and scale are highly accurate to the original plan, including bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with soft shadows; structural elements are highly readable. 2 points deducted for minor simplified geometry in the kitchen area.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of kitchen cabinetry and sink placement compared to the 2D detailed line work.

summary: A highly faithful and geometrically precise 3D transformation that preserves nearly every detail of the original architectural layout.
